title: Stuck on "Game is still in progress..."
body:
Game window isn't opening. 

Queue'd up for an ARAM. 

My status says "In Game". 

Not sure what to do

replies.body: You have to kill the game in the task manager then reopen the client. Riot needs to fix this because everyone is complaining about it (Myself included. I lost quite a bit of LP because of this), but this is a solution you can do in the short term.
Thanks. Forgot to reply but just saw this. It did infact work.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackKnightJack,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=jrG5qU5h,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-08-13T17:09:54.694+0000)
>
> You have to kill the game in the task manager then reopen the client. Riot needs to fix this because everyone is complaining about it (Myself included. I lost quite a bit of LP because of this), but this is a solution you can do in the short term.

you do not have to kill the task, but have to kill the process "league of legends.exe", its for the game window (not "L.o.L.exe*32, its for the client). the client will take it as dc, and will autoreconnent.
